name: mm-group
description: A mechanism for grouping components - for button bars, search groups, and radio groups

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Sets the width of the component to fill the width of it's parent element.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: Sets the name of the group, which in turn sets the group attribute on it's light dom children. If no group name is specified, a group name will be

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Specifies the direction in which the group should be laid out (horizontal or vertical).

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the selected item within the group i.e.- the value of a selected mm-radio or mm-button.

detail.name: value
detail.description: The value property of the item which was selected, or it's text content

detail.name: index
detail.description: The index of item which was selected.
